title: "The Night of Observation " Originals
subtitle: Did the service of the Night Church begin in 1862 with the Blacks pending the enactment of the Declaration of Freedom from New Year's Day, 1863?
author: Snopes Staff
vclaim: The services of the Night Church began in 1862 with black people in the United States pending the enactment of the Declaration of Liberation on New Year's Day, 1863.
